This has 1509kbps DTS audio whereas the kingdom release has 334kbps AAC audio and this has double the video bitrate. The kingdom release is far from better.

If you want a high definition copy, short of buying the blu ray, this is the best you can get.

Bitrate is far more important than resolution.

BestHD > Kingdom > 700-1370mb rips

Also, the source used to for the kingdom release is THIS release lol.
